pullrequest.title: Enable word wrap for globals value column

content.raw: I got a bit nerd-sniped by this, but I’ve worked out the remaining nitpicks by using a TableView. I’ll make those changes on top of this branch and merge it in after a bit more testing to make sure it doesn’t modify keyboard navigation, so don’t worry about integrating the above diff or doing anything else with this PR!
content.html: I got a bit nerd-sniped by this, but I’ve worked out the remaining nitpicks by using a TableView.
